===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# a medicinal mushroom, {{taxlink|Wolfiporia extensa|species|noshow=1}} (Peck) Ginns (formerly known as {{taxlink|Poria cocos|species|noshow=1}} and {{taxlink|Daedalea extensa|species|noshow=1}}), commonly used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] to "protect the kidney and the liver".
